meta.description:
Imagine you're a dietitian crafting a meal plan for someone with specific nutritional goals. The challenge is not just to meet these nutritional needs but to do so in the most cost-effective way possible. The individual requires a precise amount of protein, carbohydrates, and calories each day, but the budget is tight, making it crucial to minimize the cost of the meal plan.

You have a list of eight food items to choose from, each with distinct nutritional content and associated cost:

- Food_1: A modest source of protein and carbs with 1 gram of protein, 4 grams of carbohydrates, and 93 calories at a cost of $6.
- Food_2: Rich in protein with 18 grams of protein, 2 grams of carbohydrates, and 219 calories, priced at $4.
- Food_3: A balanced choice providing 19 grams of protein, 26 grams of carbs, and 155 calories for $4.
- Food_4: High in protein with 19 grams of protein, 10 grams of carbs, and 105 calories, costing $3.
- Food_5: Carb-heavy with 3 grams of protein, 24 grams of carbohydrates, and 255 calories at just $2.
- Food_6: A good mix with 8 grams of protein, 26 grams of carbs, and 182 calories for $7.
- Food_7: Impressive protein and carb content with 15 grams of protein, 27 grams of carbohydrates, and 173 calories, all for $3.
- Food_8: Carb-rich with 3 grams of protein, 30 grams of carbohydrates, and 191 calories, also at $3.

The daily dietary requirements for the individual are:

- Protein: At least 98 grams
- Carbohydrates: At least 113 grams
- Calories: At least 1768

With these food options and nutritional needs in mind, what is the minimum cost required to meet the daily protein, carbohydrate, and calorie requirements?

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content of each food item

params.name: carbs
params.description: Carbohydrate content of each food item

params.name: calories
params.description: Calorie content of each food item

vars.name: x
vars.description: Amount of each food item to include in the meal plan

objective.name: min_cost
objective.expr: quicksum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in Foods)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of the meal plan

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in Foods)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 98 grams of protein

constraints.name: carbs_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(carbs[f] * x[f] for f in Foods)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 113 grams of carbohydrates

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in Foods)
